author: ALEEF02

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Chalk (Pebble Round)
Leaderboard fix
Bug fix in leaderboard
New leader board thx to Kyle H!!!!!!
Fixed a bug where "Cool down over" would be displayed after 5 minutes of opening the app

• Fix bonus cooldown
• New overall click count
• A notification when you beat the game
• Moved reset to the main menu
• Fixed "Server" in the arrested notification card to "Serve"
Fix to being arrested
Fixed 2x bug

• Alerts you if the Good Deeds you are doing will make your Arrested Chance go below 0%
• Vibrates when you are no longer arrested.
• Arrested chance goes to 10% after being arrested
• Help Section

Now with items, good deeds, and getting arrested! Buy cool items, like indoor pools and tennis courts! Every minute your 'arrested chance' rises by 5% You can lower this chance by doing good deeds. If you get arrested, you cannot make money for 5 minutes. If you leave the app while you are arrested, you must serve another 5 minutes.
Now with multipliers! Buy a multiplier and make that much more money for 1 minute. Then wait 5 minutes for the cooldown to wear off. Also, there is a confirmation screen with the reset.
Better prices, and a bug fixed
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Now with house bonuses! Every 5 clicks you gain your house bonus + Bugs squashed
Now, if you don't have enough money buy something, when you click it, in addition to saying "Not enough money" like before this update, it says how much more money you need to buy it.
Bug fixes
Now with houses and stats! Also, menu remade.
Major bugs squashed, better prices, and tells you if you already bought that job
Now with an emergency 'Reset' button. Also, you can buy the world!

description:
Thanks for 50 ❤️'s!

WARNING: Can have high power consumption! 

Please ❤️ Money maker

Debugged by johannesn. Awesome leaderboard by Kyle H.

Click the middle button. Make money, and then more money, then more money. 

Then Click down for the main menu. Click 'manual jobs' (Jobs that increase how much you get from each click) Get a new job by paying the money below the job name. This will make it, so you get more per click - price ÷ 50. 

Click 'auto jobs' (Jobs that work themselves, and don't need to be clicked) Get more people by paying the money below the name. This will make it, so you get more per second - price ÷ 100. 

Keep an eye on your arrested chance! Every minute it goes up by 5%. You can lower this by doing good deeds. If you get arrested, you must wait 5 minutes. You cannot make money at all during this. If you leave during the sentence, you must serve five more minutes.

Click 'houses' (every five clicks you get your house bonus) Get a house by paying the money below the name. This will make it, so you get more per five clicks - price ÷ 50. 

Click 'items' (Cool stuff you can buy) Get stuff by paying the money below the name. 

Click 'multipliers' (boost your money making for 60 seconds) Get a bonus by spending the money below the name. This will make it, so you get more money for 60 seconds.

Keep on doing this until you own... THE WORLD!!

If you see any glitches, email me at the email below. There is a reset button if needed.

Disclaimer: No actual money is involved with playing this app/game
title: Money Maker
